name: Snow Bash
description:
Snow Bash is a fun and frantic little snowball fighting game for two players, competing to get the most points before the timer ends.

Pick up snowballs at your pile marked with a candy cane of your character's colour, and chuck them at your opponent. Getting a hit scores you 10 points!

Get bonus points by picking up the gifts that drop from above... and look out for power-up stars that give faster, larger, or infinite snowballs!

You can play with a gamepads (tested with Xbox Series and PlayStation 4 controllers) or just squeeze together and double up on a keyboard... or plug in another keyboard if you have one! Please see screenshots or in-game section for controls.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Originally made as a personalised gift for my niblings in the week before Xmas, I've since juiced it up, adding gameplay features, sound and music, animation, effects, and a proper interface with settings and controls. 

My plan was to add more features and extra levels but I never got round to it and have moved onto other things... and as it's currently snowing outside I have decided to release it as-is.
